A home changes everything.

Let's set up your campaign!

Enter your campaign name
Select the timeline of your campaign
Your campaign will deactivate after the selected timeline. Don’t worry -- you can always change your timeline.

Each home costs $6,500 to build. But you can create any goal amount with confidence knowing 100% of the funds raised will go directly to building homes for families in need.

$

Personalize your campaign by sharing why you’re raising funds and how your friends can make a difference. If left blank, your page will show the message below.

* Default message: 100% of your donation to ____'s Campaign will go directly to building homes in Latin America for families in need.
